Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
chainsaw \chain"saw`\ (ch[=a]n"s[add]), n. a portable power saw having teeth that are linked to form an endless chain, rotated about two pivot points by a power mechanism, such as an electric motor or a gasoline engine.
Note: They are used to efficiently cut trees, logs, or thick branches out of doors.
Syn: chain saw. [WordNet 1.5]
chain saw n : portable power saw; teeth linked to form an endless chain [syn: {chainsaw}]
chainsaw n : portable power saw; teeth linked to form an endless chain [syn: {chain saw}]
